subject: College Athletics
Basketball
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The No. 2 Sooners squandered a 15-point first-half lead but clamped down on defense in the second half, beating No. 5 Oklahoma, 66-58.
snippet: The No. 2 Sooners squandered a 15-point first-half lead but clamped down on defense in the second half, beating No. 5 Oklahoma, 66-58.
